description: Nothing warms you up like creamy pumpkin soup. This easy soup recipe features roasted pumpkin, carrot, onion and garlic for an incredible depth of flavour.
name: Easy Roasted Pumpkin Soup With Toasted Seeds Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Macro Organic butternut pumpkin halves, peeled, deseeded, cut into 3cm pieces
2 large carrots, peeled, cut into 3cm pieces
0.25 cup Macro natural seed mix with pine nuts, toasted
0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fanforced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Place pumpkin, onion, garlic and carrot on tray. Drizzle with oil and sprinkle with paprika. Bake for 30 minutes or until pumpkin and carrot are tender.
Remove and discard garlic skins. Place garlic, pumpkin, onion, carrot and stock in a blender and blend until smooth. Season with pepper.
Divide soup among bowls. Drizzle with yoghurt and serve scattered with seed mix and parsley.
